text:
Dokaor Toongtong (); is a Thai female singer form Isan area, and genre Mor lam. She is a real name Buppha Boonmee, and alias "Sao Sieng Sor" (สาวเสียงซอ).
She was born in Ubon Ratchathani Province. She was a daughter of Samran and Sanga Boonmee. She started on stage in 2003 by first album "Oak Hak Wan Hae Tien", and popular by her second album "Ber Tho Jao Choo" in 2008.
She has a younger sister is Kantong Toongnguen, which a singer same hers.
